HSB(Hue, Saturation, Brightness)

Hue, 0°-360° color wheel
Saturation, 0%-100% gray to super duper colorful
Brightness, Value 0% (black) to 100% (actual color)

    1. choose a few hues and their neighbors (DO not choose too many colors)
    2. complementary and their neighbors
    3. +Saturation + lightness

    a. warm colors & blue
    b. when using green, make it a yellow or blue one (not pure green)
    c. avoid any pure colors
    d. avoid bright, saturated colors
    e. combine with different lightness
